mapper.insert: INSERT INTO moviecrawl_tb (title, production_year, genre, director, `cast`, production_company, distribution_company) VALUES (#{title}, #{productionYear}, #{genre}, #{director}, #{cast}, #{productionCompany}, #{distributionCompany})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM moviecrawl_tb WHERE title = #{title} AND production_year = #{productionYear} AND genre = #{genre} AND director = #{director} AND `cast` = #{cast} AND production_company = #{productionCompany} AND distribution_company = #{distributionCompany})
